type.name: T:Elysium.Parameters.Window
type.summary: Represents a class that manages general settings of the styles of the controls.

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.Window.ResizeBorderThickness
property.summary: Gets or sets the thickness of the border, which is drawn during resizing .
property.value: Thickness of the border, which is drawn during resizing. The default value is 3px.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Window.GetResizeBorderThickness(Elysium.Controls.Window)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: Thickness of the border, which is drawn during resizing.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.
method.ensures: The being returned value is positive.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Window.SetResizeBorderThickness(Elysium.Controls.Window,System.Windows.Thickness)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
Thickness of the border, which is drawn during resizing.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.Window.MinimizeButtonToolTip
property.summary: Gets or sets tooltip for Minimize button of .
property.value: Tooltip. The default value is null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Window.GetMinimizeButtonToolTip(Elysium.Controls.Window)

method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
